2.speaker: B
sentence: Well, I thought you're in your mid-30s.

4.speaker: B
sentence: Really? You look young for your age.
정말? 너는 어려보여 너의 나이에 비해.

5.speaker: A
sentence: Thanks. I get that a lot. What are you up for?
고마워. 난 그런 말 많이 듣는다. 너는 뭐 먹고 싶어?

6.speaker: B
sentence: Anything. I'm not picky about food.
